typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SchemaName as string,
	TableName as string,
	KeyColumns as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> NewData
NewData alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'unified-data-cluster',
	folderPath: 'GLOVIA_PROD/JE_DET/Processed',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:(array($KeyColumns)),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss',
	booleanFormat: ['1', '0'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> SinkToAzureTable
